product_description: This small grape purple stainless steel dog food and water bowl has a no-tip, no-skid design that prevents spills, making a Bella Bowl the perfect dish for your furry friend. These bowls are designed to be both functional and stylish. Whether you use it for dry or canned food or water, both you and your pet will enjoy the design and function of these bowls. Your pets mean the world to you, which is why these bowls are of the highest quality. They feature a revolutionary, patented and award-winning design. No matter which size or color option you choose, you'll bring the bestselling bowl in the pet industry into your home. Since your dog bowls likely sit out between meals, ensure they work well with your decor. Available in an array of sophisticated shades, Loving Pets Bella Bowls can complement any aesthetic with an expanding range of metallic colors. The paw print adds a decorative element and finishing touch, making these bowls just what you're looking for. Along with offering a stylish appearance, these bowls provide exceptional durability. They are built to last with an interior made out of stainless steel and an attractive polished poly-resin exterior. Each Loving Pets Bella Bowl features a removable soy-based rubber ring. If your dog has a habit of nosing their food or water bowl around, this rubber base will help keep the bowl in place instead of sliding their meal all around your home. The no-skid dog bowl design also helps prevent spills and noise during mealtimes. These vet-recommended stainless steel bowls are also dishwasher safe, making it easier than ever to keep your pet's food or water bowls clean and hygienic. The design doesn't hold odors and is rust-resistant, making it an excellent alternative to plastic. Remove the rubber base and toss the bowl in the dishwasher, reducing your daily cleanup time.
